> Jesus Tencent wants to own everything these days

honestly it really looks like they are emulating EA's business model.

Acquire a well loved game with a solid player base.
Load it up with microtransactions
Kill the game
rinse and repeat.

I reckon LoL has about 2 years max of being profitable before the business model starts to really piss everyone off .
2 years? Everyone is already pissed off now!

> [{quoted}](name=Fitzky,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=uM1NvRHx,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-11-23T12:53:33.842+0000)
>
> 2 years? Everyone is already pissed off now!

There are a few posts defending this profit seeking strategy.

Meanwhile at EA, Fifa is being boycotted because of the bullshit microtransactions in swbf2 and Fifa.

Some people are clueless and it will take them considerable time to catch on to the fact they are being taken advantage of.

But the problem is that for every million people who are pissed off you'll get 500k who enjoy the exploitation and another 2M who just don't care so for a while this strategy will work. But it will also reduce game population significantly and unless they have plans to recruit more kids to hand over their hard earned, a sudden loss of a measurable % of the population will mean lol will start to bleed out and die in a few years.

FIFA is the most sold game year over year.
It outsells any of game franchise, yet you don't hear about this because it's not day one or week one sales, it just sells throughout the whole year.

The people that play FIFA don't care about microtransactions, they don't care about any "controversy", they don't care about any gaming news apart from what console they can play FIFA on and even then they don't care about all the extras of the console or any of the specs and certainly none of Microsoft or Sony's dick slinging.

They just want to play their yearly release of FIFA.
They occasionally pick up other games along the way depending on their tastes, but even then they don't care about any of the news around the games.

You tell these people to boycott FIFA, they wont do it even if they listen to you which they likely wont.
